pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION - https://simstrumentation.com
Starter and parking brake panel for the HJet
NOTES: - Designed for the HJet by Marwan Gharib. Will not work with any other aircraft. - BONUS HIDDEN FUNCTION: Pressing the button between the starters will toggle the throttles in and out of idle cutoff. DO NOT USE IN FLIGHT!!!
